closing_text.text: Closing #krautspace. We're sorry you need to wait outside, but there is always @freifunkjena to distract you.
Currently, there is no light in #krautspace, so why not walk the beautiful @jenalichtstadt?
#krautspace is zu, aber @offenesjena ist immer offen.

opening_text.text: At least one person is in #krautspace and invites you to come and join hacking!
